title: Northern Ireland Longitudinal Study Research Support Unit (NILS-RSU): One-Year (2011/12) Extension Proposal
abstractText:
The one-year extension continues the earlier work of the NILS-RSU.  As a core activity, the NILS-RSU team will oversee to completion the 20 projects currently in progress and the 28 that are in varying stages of development. It will also:

  • maintain the NILS secure data environment
  • provide documentation to the data resources that are available and comment on some of the most commonly faced problems in using the NILS
  • maintain and improve the NILS website
  • promote the use of the NILS by academic and other users.

Looking further forward it will work together with NISRA and other interested parties:

  • in support of the 2011 Census-NILS linkage project
  • in promoting the use of the NILS by government policymakers
  • in widening the academic use of NILS data
  • in exploring the possibility of linkages to other data
  • in preparing for the vastly-increased potential of the NILS arising from the planned 2011 Census linkage.
